overview: Director Michael Raven's penetrating journey into a dark, decadent world deep inside the mind of a young woman. Strange things keep happening to Corrine (Ava Vincent) plagued by a series of ever increasing sexual visions she begins to slowly descend into a fantasy versus reality universe where sin, sex and erotic diversions are the rule... world of absolute abandon and total self-indulgence; some call it madness, we call it Limbo.
title: Limbo
